content:
The Royalton Park Avenue Hotel offers downtown edge with an uptown sensibility. Boasting 249 luxury rooms and remarkable suites, most with lofty ceilings, Juliet balconies, and five fixture bathrooms – the property perched on the corner of 29th Street and Park Avenue couldn’t be more centrally located.

The rooftop pool will be closed 02/05 until 04/02, as we are preparing for Summer.
